brand_identity.name: Mallow
brand_identity.design_philosophy: Botanical Luxury. Fusion of botanical illustrations with minimalist Swiss typography. High focus on negative space and texture.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all body text, UI elements, and prices. Relaxed line-height.

texture.name: Organic Grain
texture.css_rule: background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 400 400' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.9' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
texture.usage: Apply as a fixed overlay on the body with pointer-events-none to give a paper-like feel.

grid_system.shop: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density, uniform)
grid_system.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-24 for section padding.

containers.alignment: Center usually, but use asymmetric columns for content.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

cards.style: Flat, no shadow by default. 1px solid border. Padding p-6 or p-8.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-input rounded-none focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 px-0 py-4

atmosphere.description: Close up of skin texture/neck (Hero Image)

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided 'Organic Grain' SVG as a background overlay on the <body> tag to create a physical paper texture.
Implement the 'Bento Grid Mode A' for the Homepage Hero section: Mix the product images with the atmospheric textures (honeycomb, lavender).
On the Product Page: Use a sticky layout where the product image stays fixed on the left while the user scrolls through the description on the right.
For the 'Add to Cart' button: It must be full width on mobile, and sharp-edged (rounded-sm) to match the boxy, brutalist-lite aesthetic.
Language: EVERYTHING must be in Dutch (Nederlands).
Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (H1-H4) and 'Mulish' for body text. IMPORT THESE FONTS in index.css.
Use the 'Deep Charcoal' (#1C1C1C) for text, never pure black.
Use 'Bone White' (#F9F9F7) as the main background color, avoiding stark #FFFFFF except for product cards to create depth.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. e.g. py-24 or py-32 for sections.
Every interactive element must have a hover state (opacity change or border color change).
All interactive elements must include data-testid attributes.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or the grain texture.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
